body.name: Hasense Large Kitchen Utensil Holder for Kitchen Counter, 7.1" Ceramic Cooking Utensil Holder, Stylish Utensil Organizer for Countertop, Sturdy Utensil Caddy Crock, Home Decor Gift, Gradient Orange

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 6 mins
features: FUNCTIONAL ELEGANCE: The Hasense Large Kitchen Utensil Holder, standing at 7.1", is a ceramic marvel designed to enhance your kitchen counter. With a captivating gradient orange hue, it seamlessly combines functionality with a stylish edge, making it a standout organizer.

OPTIMAL SIZE FOR ORGANIZATION: This utensil organizer provides ample space for your cooking utensils, ensuring they are neatly arranged and easily accessible. The generous size caters to various utensil sets, promoting a clutter-free and efficient countertop.

STYLISH UTENSIL CADDY: Elevate your kitchen decor with this stylish utensil caddy. The gradient orange design not only adds a vibrant pop of color but also makes a statement on your countertop. It's more than an organizer; it's a chic home decor piece.

PERFECT HOME DECOR GIFT: Searching for a thoughtful home decor gift? The Hasense cooking utensil holder in gradient orange is an ideal choice. Practical and stylish, it adds flair to any kitchen, making it a perfect gift for housewarmings or any special occasion.

EFFORTLESS CLEANING: The smooth surface of the Hasense Utensil Holder ensures easy cleaning. Simply wipe it down or toss it into the dishwasher for a quick and hassle-free cleanup. Enjoy the convenience of a tidy kitchen with this elegant and practical utensil crock.

Keep your kitchen tools within arm's reach, promoting a clutter-free and efficient cooking space. The stylish design adds flair to your countertop while maintaining practicality.

Its smooth surface and ceramic construction make it easy to clean – a quick wipe or a run through the dishwasher keeps it looking pristine, ensuring a hygienic utensil storage solution. STABILITY REINVENTED Say goodbye to tipped-over cooking utensil holder. The stable design of this cutlery jar ensures it stays firmly in place, even when fully loaded. Enjoy a reliable and steadfast utensil organizer that stands up to the demands of your busy kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, very useful, and REALLY attractive
reviews.reviewText: I picked this big utensil holder in the gradient green color, and I'm very pleased with it indeed. It's really nice quality - heavy and sturdy, and with a beautiful glaze.The size and weight of the utensil holder means that it's very stable sitting on the kitchen counter even when there's nothing in it, and that it doesn't wobble around at all when I'm putting utensils in/taking them out/rummaging around trying to find that one beloved spatula or whatever. I have a VERY full utensil drawer (don't we all?) but I'm also one of those 'out of sight is out of mind' type people, where I apparently am not in possession of enough object permanence to remember that I actually own X specific utensil, let alone remember to use it. Thus, I've pulled out a selection of different utensils that I use frequently (or would, if I could lay my hands on them when I need them) and put them in this jar so they'll be right there on the counter when I need them. Next up: clearing out that drawer altogether and evicting some of the inhabitants that turned out to be duds and are just taking up space.All in all, this jar is lovely - it's very useful, and it looks very nice indeed sitting on my counter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant, sturdy vase or tool-holder
reviews.reviewText: This utensil holder is a good size -- it's relatively big and can hold a lot of items, whether that's kitchen utensils or handyman or gardening tools (if you're looking to add a splash of color to your workshop of garage). It'd also make for a lovely vase. It feels like it's made from a nice, sturdy ceramic (breakable, of course, since it's ceramics -- but the walls are relatively thick and it doesn't feel fragile, as far as this type of material goes). The red-to-orange glaze is really vibrant and eye-catching. I own a few Hasense products now and they're all quite nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality At-Hand Storage and Convenience
reviews.reviewText: This ceramic utensil holder from Hasense is the Goldilocks' of utensil holders. It's not too big. It's not too small. It's just the right size.I ordered the graduated green version of this utility holder and it is exactly as pictured and described in the Amazon item description. I ordered it as a companion for a similar but overcrowded utensil holder we already had to hold all the non-spatula, forks, and other tall utensils we have. This one is definitely bigger and holds more than our old utensil jar so the taller, larger items have found a new home here. Further, it is very thick, has a good weight and is pretty stable making it a better choice for pulling out a tall utensil when you are in a hurry on the stove.I'm very happy with this order and see us getting years of use out of it. Definitely a recommend to anyone looking for quality, at-hand convenience and storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy Utensil Holder w/Large Opening
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality item. I am sure it could be used for a variety of purposes. My current utensil holder is full, so I got this one to use along side it. I love the blue color and how big the opening up top is. The only thing it is missing, in my opinion, is a rubber bottom or a rubber ring around the edge that sits on the counter. That may just be my preference, so no stars deducted. I do recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Le Creuset dupe!!
reviews.reviewText: When my sister saw this she said it looks like a Le Creuset dupe! It is just as beautiful but at a fraction of the cost (less than half the cost). I love the vibrant colors and it is super sturdy. It easily fit all of my utensils in it (13 pieces) and has room for a few more. The pop of color in my kitchen is so pretty. If you are on the fence on this, go ahead and jump. You'll be glad you did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and so pretty
reviews.reviewText: I love the color gradient of this utensil holder. Not only is it pretty to look at, it really does hold a large number of kitchen utensils. It also came in two boxes and felt very well protected. It's sturdy and it's easy to clean, which is always important for anything in the kitchen. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great accent piece for any room in your house.
reviews.reviewText: This ceramic utensil holder added color to my kitchen with smooth surface texture and artistic color gradations. The glazed finish is easy to clean and its hefty weight keeps it in place when searching for the right stir spoon.This could easily be used for any interior decorating however it would not do as a planter due to no drainage orifice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful utensil jar that can double as a vase
reviews.reviewText: This is a really lovely jar. It's a bright blue color, but not garish. It will add a pop of color, for sure, but doesn't look out of place in an adult home. The variation in blue is nice too--kind of a mix between an ombre and a stripe. It's nice. The mouth of the jar is pretty wide, so you can fit a lot of utensils in there. It's a great height for kitchen utensils, too. The shape has a graceful curve, so it's not a boring vertical line but you also don't lose out on interior volume very much. It's hefty, so it won't easily be knocked over, but it also isn't so heavy that you risk damaging surfaces. This could easily double as a vase--probably most easily for artificial or dried flowers/plants because there is no drainage hole. Really quality, beautiful product.
